summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Spencer Green Hotel Management System. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend UI is working well with proper navigation, booking engine, and admin dashboard. All core features tested successfully.
passed_tests: Backend API authentication with admin credentials
All room endpoints returning correct data
Homepage hero section and booking engine
Date pickers working correctly (check-in today, check-out tomorrow default)
Booking modal opening and form functionality
Navigation menu working (Home, Kamar, Meeting, Wedding, Fasilitas, Gallery, Cek Reservasi)
Gallery page with TikTok-style vertical scroll
Admin dashboard showing stats and recent reservations
Admin navigation sidebar and toggle functionality
